tiles.direction
Interface DirectionComponent

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
FourWayDirection, NoDirection, TwoWayDirection
public interface DirectionComponent
extends java.io.Serializable

Component that handles tile direction.

Method Summary
 boolean canRotate()
          Returns true if user can rotate the tile during the game.
 Direction getDirection()
          Returns the tile direction.
 void rotate()
          Rotates the tile clockwise.
 void setDirection(Direction direction)
          Sets the tile direction.
